name: OR_LNLG_COUNTS_QTY
description: Clarity table created for storing the related items which are the individual items and their quantities.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: COUNT_IND_ITM_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: This will be used to build the category list of individual items for the counts.

columns.name: QUANTITY_COUNTED
columns.description: This will be used to document the quantity for each individual item counted

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.
